effects.display_string: Set: Your spells and abilities have a chance to hit a Jackpot! that increases your auto shot damage by 200% and reduces the time between auto shots by 0.5 sec for 10 sec. Casting Trueshot always hits a Jackpot!
Set: Consuming Lock and Load also fires an Explosive Shot at 300% effectiveness.

name: Cyrce's Circlet
description: Sea dogs and tale spinners tell stories of a mythical siren that could lure even the stubbornest sailors to a watery grave.

spells.description: Use: Raise your signet to the Light, increasing your highest secondary stat by 7,158 for 20 sec. Your act inspires nearby signetbearers within your party, granting them 188 of the same stat for 20 sec. (2 Min Cooldown)

name: Suspicious Energy Drink

spells.description: Equip: When you use harmful spells or abilities, there is a chance you also take a sip of the energy drink, increasing your Mastery by 4,063 for 10 sec. Gain an additional 596 Mastery if you are below 35% health.

description: A death-defying concoction made with Mama's secret recipe to numb your sense of self-preservation.

spells.description: Equip: Your gear warms with Woven Dawnthread and gains 756 Critical Strike when over 80% health.
Equip: You champion the causes of your guild.  All guild reputation gains are increased by 100%.
